description: Try our easy to follow Baby's Beef And Mushroom Couscous recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baby food,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Soy free,Mince,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Baby's Beef And Mushroom Couscous Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until they start to soften. Stir through the garlic, spinach and mushrooms and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Add the mince and continue cooking for 5 minutes until the meat is sealed. Pour in the passata.
Simmer the mince mixture for 8-10 minutes over medium low heat until sauce is reduced. Stir through cheese then remove from heat and cool slightly.

Place the mixture in a blender or food processor with 1/3 cup cooled boiled water and blend to desired consistency for babyâ€™s developmental age. Stir through couscous and add a little breast milk or pre prepared formula if desired. Makes 12 baby serves
